entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
